author: audreyj
title: Première communion à Hilbesheim
text:
Première communion à Hilbesheim
Dimanche 26 mai 2024, jour de la Sainte-
Trinité, quatorze enfants de la Communauté de paroisses Sainte-Agathe de Réding ont communié pour la première fois à Hilbesheim.
La célébration a commencé par l’entrée en procession où chaque enfant tenait dans ses mains un petit lumignon qu’il avait décoré avec soin pour le déposer devant l’autel de célébration.
Le père Raja Lourdusamy a partagé à l’assemblée la motivation des enfants durant toute leur année de préparation et que, bien souvent, ils ont choisi de sacrifier d’autres activités.
Le mot d’accueil, les lectures, la prière universelle et les remerciements ont été pris en charge par les enfants.
Au moment de la prière du Notre Père, les communiants ont pris place autour de l’autel dans le chœur.
Après avoir communié, tous les enfants sont allés rendre grâce à Marie en chantant l’Ave Marie de Glorious, puis ils ont chacun déposé une rose à ses pieds.
Comme ce jour correspondait également à la fête des mères, le père Raja a invité les mamans à rejoindre leur enfant dans le chœur. Elles ont eu la surprise de recevoir chacune une rose.
La
messe s’est terminée avec un chant gestué et chanté par les enfants.

author: Ashima Sharda Mahindra
title: No, Figs Are Not Non-Vegetarian Fruits! Here's Debunking The Viral Claim Which Talks Of Wasps Pollination
text: Trending: No, Figs Are Not Non-Vegetarian Fruits! Here's Debunking The Viral Claim Which Talks Of Wasps Pollination Figs are non-vegetarian – this claim has been all over the internet over the past few days. However, according to food expert Krish Ashok, figs that are commercially produced in India are not pollinated with the help of wasps. Read on to learn more about how figs form and why you should incorporate them into your daily diet. Known for their nutritional benefits like boosting gut health, strengthening muscles, and improving energy levels, figs also reduce the risk of type 2 diabetes “No wasps are involved in commercially produced figs in India,” says food expert Krish Ashok, debunking the viral claims which say that figs are non-vegetarian. In the last few days, social media has been buzzed with news that figs are insect pollinated. Also known as Anjeer, figs are a delicious fruit often consumed in dried form in India. Known for their nutritional benefits like boosting gut health, strengthening muscles, and improving energy levels, figs also reduce the risk of type 2 diabetes. However, many have been worried that the fruit may be non-vegetarian. “All of this is true only if you eat a special variety of figs from Turkey called Smyrna which is pollinated by wasps,” Ashok told his followers in an Instagram reel. “All fruit varieties grown in India are common figs that produce fruit parthenocarpically,” he added. Parthenocarpy is the natural or artificially induced production of fruit without fertilization of ovules, which makes the fruit seedless. “The fruits develop without need for pollination, so no wasps are involved in commercially produced figs in India,” Ashok added. “And if eating figs makes you non-veg, then I have some bad news for you. Even if you eat fancy figs from Turkey, you will at best eat 1-2 mg of insect parts but even otherwise, you are consuming 1000-20000 mg of insects every single day,” said Ashok. Fig varieties commercially grown and sold in India include Poona, Conadria, Mission, Kadota, and Brown Turkey. Why should you add figs to your daily diet? Figs, indigenous to western Asia – the Middle East and Mediterranean regions symbolize longevity and have been consumed since ancient times. The fruit is loaded with fibre, antioxidants, and some amounts of vitamins and minerals. Fig consumption is linked to a number of positive health outcomes, a few of which include: High in antioxidants Both the flesh and skins of figs are loaded with antioxidants – mainly phenolic acids and flavonoids which are absorbed from the digestive system into the bloodstream and have potent anti-inflammatory effects in the body. Regulate digestion The fibre in figs supports bowel regularity as the fruit – high in prebiotics helps feed beneficial probiotic bacteria in the gut tied to anti-inflammation. The fruit is also great for those who have irritable bowel syndrome. Supports menstrual health Eating dried figs helps reduce the symptoms of primary dysmenorrhea – or having painful periods which are usually experienced one or two days per month by more than half of women across the world. Supports weight loss and management Studies say eating figs is associated with having a lower body weight by improving post-meal satiety and blood sugar regulation. Reduces cancer risk The potential effects of figs depend on the ability to inhibit the formation of tumours and the development of cancer cells. Natural compounds in figs also help prevent cancer cells from growing and spreading in the body. Get [Latest News](https://www.timesnownews.com/latest-news)Live on Times Now along with Breaking News and Top Headlines from[Health](https://www.timesnownews.com/health)and around the world.Trending: Ashima Sharda Mahindra author Is a prolific writer with a varied experience of over two decades of journalism under her belt. She writes passionately about diverse health topics wi...[View More](https://www.timesnownews.com/author/ashima-sharda-mahindra-479257930) End of Article Subscribe to our daily Lifestyle Newsletter! Does Moringa Have Nine Times More Protein Than Yogurt? Know How To Incorporate Both For Healthy Heart and Muscles Why King Charles Chose Michael Dixon: The Doctor Who Divides Opinions with Homoeopathy Massive Spike In Demand For Male Potency Drugs Among Young Men In India; Here's Why Sunita Williams Weight Loss: NASA Astronaut Refutes ‘Rumours’, Says Experiencing Fluid Shift, Exercising Regularly New Therapeutic Vaccine Gives Hope Against Super-Aggressive Triple-Negative Breast Cancer

author: Iraima Gómez Ramírez
title: Quiroga respalda llamado a elecciones libres y justas en Venezuela
text:
LA PAZ.- El expresidente de Bolivia, Jorge Tuto Quiroga, se une al llamado por elecciones transparentes y equitativas en Venezuela, destacando la importancia de brindar a la oposición una oportunidad justa para competir en el proceso electoral.
Quiroga, en una publicación en la red social X, expresó su apoyo al criterio reflejado en el editorial del periódico The Washington Post titulado: "Para Venezuela, un rayo de luz. Den a la oposición unas elecciones libres y justas".
Lee además LIDER VENEZOLANA Jorge "Tuto" Quiroga dedica el Día Internacional de la Mujer a María Corina Machado ELECCIONES DE VENEZUELA Jorge Tuto Quiroga celebra aislamiento de Maduro y distancia de sus aliados de izquierda El editorial destaca que la oposición venezolana ha logrado mantenerse activa y ahora se enfrenta a una oportunidad crucial en las urnas, luego de años de represión por parte del régimen de Maduro, que ha incluido detenciones arbitrarias y violaciones a los derechos humanos.
Embed - https://publish.twitter.com/oembed?url=https://x.com/tutoquiroga/status/1811430706889023548&partner=&hide_thread=false Editorial de @washingtonpost sobre #28Jul : "Esta podría ser la última y mejor oportunidad que tiene #Venezuela de poner fin a una generación de desgobierno."
En @la_patilla : https://t.co/RdLUcFtsTm pic.twitter.com/wQPaKvSKlx
— Tuto Quiroga (@tutoquiroga) July 11, 2024 El texto afirma que Maduro ha obstaculizado la participación de numerosos candidatos de la oposición en la contienda por el poder. Las acciones emprendidas por Estados Unidos para respaldar a las fuerzas opositoras, mediante presiones y sanciones durante la administración del presidente Donald Trump, así como en negociaciones durante el mandato del presidente Biden, han arrojado resultados diversos.
The Washington Post dice que, a pesar de las sanciones que impactaron en la industria petrolera de Venezuela, Maduro ha logrado mantenerse en el poder gracias, en parte, al apoyo de países como Rusia, China, Cuba e Irán.
Oportunidad Única “Venezuela, que en algún momento fue una de las naciones más prósperas de América Latina, se encuentra actualmente inmersa en una de las peores crisis humanitarias a nivel mundial, lo que provocó la salida de más de 7,5 millones de personas desde 2015, incluyendo cientos de miles hacia Estados Unidos”, precisa el escrito.
También señala que, a pesar de los obstáculos impuestos por el gobierno, líderes como María Corina Machado siguen adelante con valentía en la campaña electoral, buscando un cambio democrático para el país.
En el artículo consideran que las próximas elecciones en Venezuela representan una oportunidad única para el pueblo venezolano de expresar su voluntad y poner fin a décadas de desgobierno y corrupción. Es fundamental que se garantice un proceso electoral justo y transparente, libre de interferencias y manipulaciones por parte del régimen actual.
Instan en la publicación a la comunidad internacional a prestar atención a esta situación crítica en Venezuela y a abogar por una votación libre y justa. En un momento crucial para el país sudamericano es vital que se respeten los principios democráticos y se permita que la voluntad del pueblo sea escuchada.
Finalmente, The Washington Post señala que la esperanza de un futuro más próspero y democrático para Venezuela reside en la celebración de elecciones libres y justas, donde la oposición tenga la oportunidad real de competir sin temor a represalias ni manipulaciones. El mundo observa con atención este proceso electoral que podría marcar un punto de inflexión en la historia de Venezuela.
[email protected]
FUENTE: Cuenta de la red social X del Expresidente Jorge Tuto Quiroga,Editorial The Washington Post

author: Mailenys Oliva Ferrales
title: Recibe acciones de conservación el Monumento Nacional Portada de la Libertad
text: LAS COLORADAS, Niquero.–Considerado un sitio emblemático de la nación cubana, por su alto valor histórico, el Monumento Nacional Portada de la Libertad, ubicado en esta comunidad costera de la provincia de Granma, recibe acciones de conservación que dotarán a la instalación de un mejor confort y de un ambiente más atractivo para los visitantes. Las obras constructivas –que comenzaron el pasado mes de agosto, previo a la conmemoración, en diciembre próximo, del aniversario 68 del desembarco de los expedicionarios del yate Granma– incluyen, entre otros trabajos, la demolición total de rasilla de la azotea y su posterior impermeabilización; la sustitución de pisos de hormigón en las áreas de la cafetería y de la plaza; y la rehabilitación del drenaje que se encontraba obstruido. Especialistas del Centro Provincial de Patrimonio en Granma señalaron a este diario que también se trabaja en el enchape de un baño, y en la reparación de la cubierta y de las paredes de la casa del campesino (reproducción del bohío de Ángel Pérez Rosabal, primer lugareño que colaboró con los jóvenes revolucionarios encabezados por Fidel); aunque esta última recibirá una restauración capital de cara al aniversario 70 de la efeméride. Yudelkis Vega Viltre, especialista principal y administradora del Monumento Nacional, precisó que en el remozamiento del emblemático complejo monumentario intervienen varios organismos y entidades del territorio, además de brigadas especializadas de la Empresa de Construcción y Montaje (Coingex). Dijo, además, que están previstas otras acciones constructivas en etapas posteriores, que contemplarán el mantenimiento de la red hidrosanitaria y pintura, así como la reparación, en algunos tramos, del sendero de más de mil metros, que conduce hasta el escenario del desembarco, acaecido en Los Cayuelos, el 2 de diciembre de 1956. De acuerdo con un reporte de la acn, paralelamente, se labora en la propuesta de nuevo montaje museográfico que pretende convertir a la instalación en el primer Monumento Nacional de la provincia que utilice recursos interactivos, con el propósito de ofrecer una experiencia de visita más atractiva para los diferentes públicos. Al respecto, Vega Viltre expresó que el proyecto prevé que los visitantes, mediante el uso de sus teléfonos móviles, puedan acceder a una información detallada de los objetos y de la historia del Monumento Nacional Portada de la Libertad.

author: Yahoo Sports
title: Brittany Mahomes and Taylor Swift spotted on girls' night out in LA ahead of Chiefs game
text:
TODAY Brittany Mahomes and Taylor Swift spotted on girls' night out in LA ahead of Chiefs game Scott Stump and Ariana Brockington January 8, 2024 at 1:36 AM · 8 min read 92 Link Copied Read full article Brittany Mahomes and Taylor Swift spotted on girls' night out in LA ahead of Chiefs game Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again later. More content below Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again later. More content below Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again later. More content below Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again later. More content below Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again later. More content below Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again later. More content below
Taylor Swift and Brittany Mahomes spent the night before the singer's expected appearance at the 2024 Golden Globe Awards grabbing dinner together in Los Angeles.
Multiple Swiftie update accounts shared photos on X, formerly known as Twitter , of the pop icon and Brittany Mahomes, married to Chiefs star Patrick Mahomes, leaving a restaurant together Jan. 6. Lyndsay Bell, who is the wife of Chiefs tight end Blake Bell , also joined them.
In the pictures, Swift stuns in a black mini dress and over-the-knee boots. Brittany Mahomes wore a black blouse, gray mini skirt and knee-high boots and Bell braved the chilly LA night in a white turtleneck sweater dress, leather jacket and black boots.
Their night out came ahead of the Golden Globe Awards and the Chiefs game against the Los Angeles Chargers on Jan. 7. Swift's concert film, "Taylor Swift: The Eras Tour," has been nominated for cinematic and box office achievement at the awards show. Variety has predicted that the "Karma" singer could walk away with the new honor, which was added to the ceremony this year to recognize a movie with "extensive global audience support."
If Swift attends the Golden Globes at the Beverly Hilton in person, then she will likely have to miss the Chiefs-Chargers game, which kicks off at 4:25 p.m. ET, since the award show starts promptly at 8 p.m. ET. She has attended the last five Chiefs games to cheer for the team and her boyfriend Travis Kelce .
TODAY.com has reached out to Kelce and Swift's representatives to see which LA event she will attend. But, it is possible Kelce won't take the field in the last regular season game as the Chiefs have already secured a playoff spot and multiple star players, like quarterback Patrick Mahomes, will not play against the Chargers.
ESPN reported Jan. 3 that Patrick Mahomes will rest and coach Andy Reid hinted that other players wouldn't enter the game either.
So, fans might not spot Swift seated next to Brittany Mahomes at the game or get another glimpse into their friendship like they have for the past few games.
Brittany Mahomes last shared photos with the musician at a Chiefs game on Instagram Dec. 5. In one of the snaps, Swift and Brittany Mahomes posed with Bell in their similar red outfits to show support for their team.
Taylor Swift, Brittany Mahomes, Lyndsay Bell (@brittanylynne via Instagram)
The photos were taken at the Chiefs' Dec. 3 game against the Green Bay Packers , where fans noted that Swift's red coat looked a lot like one that Brittany Mahomes wore to a previous game.
Now it appears that Bell has access to one of the eye-catching red coats, too.
Back in November, Brittany Mahomes made her friendship with Swift Instagram official when she posted a photo of herself posing with Swift, Bell and Paige Buechele, who's the wife of former Chiefs backup quarterback, Shane Buechele .
Brittany Mahomes shares photos from Taylor's get-together with Chiefs wives (@brittanylynne via Instagram)
The photo came two days after the trio were spotted leaving Swift's Tribeca apartment , the same day the Chiefs defeated the Miami Dolphins in the NFL's first-ever match in Germany.
Between Instagram posts and nights out on both coasts, a friendship appears to be blossoming between Swift and the mom of two . Here's what to know.
September 24, 2023: Brittany Mahomes and Taylor Swift are first spotted together Swift first sent Chiefs and NFL fans into a frenzy when she attended the Chiefs’ win over the Chicago Bears on Sept. 24.
Ahead of Kansas City’s next game, an eventual win over the Jets at New Jersey’s MetLife Stadium, Swift and Brittany Mahomes were spotted out to dinner together in New York City as they got acquainted.
Brittany Mahomes has been absorbed into a group of Swift’s friends that also includes Selena Gomez, Zoe Kravitz, Lively, Turner, the Haim sisters and producer Jack Antonoff, as further meetups demonstrate.
Oct. 1, 2023: Brittany Mahomes and Taylor Swift are first seen at a game together The duo were first spotted at a game together when the Chiefs played against the New York Jets on Oct. 1. In addition to Brittany Mahomes, Swift was also seen with Blake Lively, Ryan Reynolds, Sophie Turner and Hugh Jackman that night.
During the Chiefs 19-8 victory against the Denver Broncos at Arrowhead Stadium Oct. 12, the “Blank Space” singer and Brittany Mahomes also popped up on the broadcast celebrating together .
They were seen hugging during the first half and later celebrating a touchdown. Kelce also had a big game, with Patrick Mahomes finding him for nine catches for 124 yards in the victory.
Oct. 22, 2023: They debuted a handshake The two were seen celebrating in style after a touchdown during the Kansas City Chiefs' 31-17 win over the Los Angeles Chargers at Arrowhead Stadium on Oct. 22 as they cheered on Travis Kelce, Patrick Mahomes and the Chiefs at large.
Taylor Swift and Brittany Mahomes have a BFF handshake. #ChiefsKingdom
(via NFL) pic.twitter.com/l0cBd6PzZk
— Sunday Night Football on NBC (@SNFonNBC) October 22, 2023
Following a 46-yard touchdown pass from Patrick Mahomes to wide receiver Marquez Valdes-Scantling in the second quarter, Swift and the wife of the quarterback broke out a new handshake in a scene shown on the broadcast.
They started with two slaps with the front of their right hands, followed by two slaps with the back of their hands, and then Swift pulled Brittany Mahomes toward her for a finishing move.
A new BFF handshake was officially born, although it looked like the two had put in some practice beforehand so they could nail it when it came time during the game.
Swift and Brittany Mahomes were also seen cheering together at other parts of the win over the Chargers. Brittany Mahomes was often holding one of her two children with Patrick Mahomes, daughter Sterling, 2, and 11-month-old son, Bronze.
Taylor Swift and Brittany Mahomes (David Eulitt / Getty Images) And possibly wore matching jewelry
Brittany Mahomes and Swift appear to have ties that go beyond that gesture. TikToker and gemstone wholesaler Julia Hackman Chafé observed that Swift and Brittany Mahomes appeared to be wearing matching jewelry at the game .
Chafé identified Swift wearing the necklace from Cartier's Juste un Clou collection. Brittany Mahomes had a bracelet from the same collection. Both the necklace and bracelet appear to be shaped like a nail, the Juste un Clou's signature look.
Brittany Mahomes, Taylor Swift (Getty Images)
In addition to the Cartier piece, the pop megastar added another new wrinkle on Oct. 22 by wearing one of her signature friendship bracelets that featured a heart and the number 87, which is Kelce’s jersey number.
Nov. 4, 2023: Brittany Mahomes joins Swift for a night out with Selena Gomez, Gigi Hadid and more Swift's friend group reconvened on a New York November night. Flanked by longtime friend Selena Gomez and new friend Brittany Mahomes, Swift led the way out of a restaurant, where photographers captured images.
Brittany Mahomes, Taylor Swift and Selena Gomez are seen on November 04, 2023 in New York City. (Gotham / GC Images)
In the pictures, Swift holds their hands. Sophie Turner and Gigi Hadid hung back, a few steps behind.
Brittany Mahomes, Taylor Swift, Selena Gomez, Gigi Hadid and Sophie Turner are seen in NoHo on November 04, 2023 in New York City. (Gotham / GC Images) Nov. 5, 2023: Brittany Mahomes is pictured leaving Swift's house
Several wives of Kansas City Chiefs players, along with Brittany Mahomes, were photographed leaving Swift's New York home on Nov. 5, the same day Chiefs played the Miami Dolphins in Germany.
“WAGs” is shorthand for shorthand for wives and girlfriends of high-profile sportspeople.
Brittany Mahomes is married to Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes . Paige Buechele is former Chiefs primary backup quarterback Shane Buechele’s wife. Lyndsay Bell is married to Chiefs tight end Blake Bell.
Nov. 6, 2023: Brittany Mahomes posts a photo of her and Swift Seeming to confirm the gathering on Nov. 5, Brittany Mahomes posted a photo of her with Swift, Paige Buechele and Lyndsay Bell, the other women photographed leaving Swift's home.
Dec. 3, 2023: Swift seem to wear the same red coat Brittany Mahomes wore a year prior At the Chiefs matchup against the Green Bay Packers on Dec. 3, Swift donned a long red teddy coat with an all-black ensemble and gold jewelry to cheer on Kelce.
Britney Mahomes and Taylor Swift (@brittanylynne, @RiledUpForSwift via Instagram)
On social media, fans speculated as to whether Swift borrowed the statement piece from Brittany Mahomes, as the quarterback's wife was seen wearing the jacket in 2022.
Dec. 5, 2023: Brittany Mahomes shares a new pic of her posing with Swift and Lyndsay Bell It seems Swift isn't the only one who shares Brittany Mahomes' taste in big red coats.
Taylor Swift, Brittany Mahomes, Lyndsay Bell (@brittanylynne via Instagram)
In new pics Mahomes posted Dec. 5 on Instagram , Swift and Lyndsay Bell, wife of Chiefs tight end, Blake Bell, sport matching red coats as they pose alongside Mahomes.
Jan. 6, 2024: Swift, Brittany Mahomes and Bell grab dinner together in LA The trio were photographed leaving a LA restaurant together the night before the 2024 Golden Globes and the Chiefs' last regular season game against the Chargers.
This article was originally published on TODAY.com
View comments

author: Austin Campbell, Local Journalism Initiative Reporter SNnewswatch.com
title: "We have work to do": Fiddler
text: Officials from the federal government and Nishnawbe Aski Nation (NAN) gathered in Ottawa on Jan. 24 to discuss the ongoing suicide crisis that has gripped youth in First Nations across the province and the country. Chiefs from NAN-represented First Nations were all in attendance. Four federal ministers were also in attendance – including Patty Hajdu (Indigenous Services), Gary Anandasangaree (Crown-Indigenous Relations), Ya’ara Saks (Mental Health and Addictions), and Mark Holland (Health) who joined virtually. Assembly of First Nations National Chief Cindy Woodhouse and Ontario Regional Chief Glen Hare joined as well. An invite was extended to four provincial ministers but they did not make an appearance. In his letter to the ministers, to Premier Doug Ford, and to Prime Minister Justin Trudeau, NAN Grand Chief Alvin Fiddler stressed the importance of working together to address the issues faced by Indigenous youth in and outside of First Nations communities. “Our people are suffering, and more will be lost unless we take meaningful, collective action on an expedited basis. Having each of you and your ministers sitting with us would send a strong message that the lives of First Nations, and our children, are worth saving. "I ask you to respond to this request with the urgency it deserves,” Fiddler wrote. Dougall Media reached out to Greg Rickford, Minister of Indigenous Affairs – one of the provincial ministers invited to the emergency meeting – about his absence and the absence of his fellow ministers. Rickford declined to comment. As the emergency meeting got underway, Fiddler took to social media to note how “unfortunate” it was that Ontario ministers were absent and promised that it would be part of the discussion. Hajdu made similar remarks speaking to Dougall Media in advance of the meeting. The floor was open to hear concerns from across NAN territory. Neskantaga First Nation Chief Chris Moonias stressed the gravity of the situation while highlighting the effect of colonial practices on First Nations communities. “NAN territory is at the point of collapse with mental health and addictions issues. You want our resources but you don’t care about us,” Moonias said in a NAN media release. Eugene Tait, a council member of Sachigo Lake First Nation, expressed the need for emergency mental health supports. Sachigo Lake First Nation is the most recent community to experience the effects of this crisis, having just lost a 12-year-old girl to suicide. Chief Sylvia Koostachin-Metatawabin of Attawapiskat First Nation highlighted the fact that even just accessing care can be another huge barrier for Indigenous Canadians. “Access to care is very challenging and timing is critical. Six out of 10 of my members are needlessly dying due to the cracks in the health-care system,” she said in the NAN release. Others addressed the need for community workers who focus on suicide prevention and for a better overall health-care framework in-place to address issues related to mental health. The result of NAN’s emergency meeting was made clear in Fiddler’s words to Greg Rickford on social media afterwards. “We have work to do,” Fiddler wrote. If you or anyone you know is contemplating suicide or self-harm, call or text 988. Additionally, First Nations communities have access to the Choose Life program started by NAN in 2017.

author: Matteo Castellucci
title: Un nuovo video mostra prigionieri palestinesi senza vestiti a Gaza City - Corriere della Sera
text:
Un nuovo video mostrerebbe prigionieri palestinesi spogliati dei loro vestiti. È stato girato allo stadio Yarmouk di Gaza City, secondo quanto ricostruito da Cnn e Sky News, che non hanno potuto verificare a quando risalgano le immagini: per la Bbc tra il 14 e il 18 dicembre, quando nelle rilevazioni satellitari della zona compaiono le tracce dei cingolati, in azione nel filmato.
Un nuovo video mostra prigionieri palestinesi senza vestiti a Gaza City
Le immagini sarebbero state girate allo stadio Yarmouk a metà dicembre. L’Idf a Sky News: «È necessario perquisire chi è sospettato di terrorismo»
Nella sequenza, di quasi 3 minuti, si vedono quelli che sembrano alcuni minorenni in mutande e un paio di bambini, a giudicare dalla statura, obbedire agli ordini dei soldati. La folla comprende donne velate e anziani, viene radunata sul prato.
Sfila con le mani in alto. In un frame si notano due donne bendate, inginocchiate con le mani dietro la schiena, sotto la porta da calcio, sulla traversa c’è una bandiera israeliana. In un altro, sei file di uomini seduti e inginocchiati, con le braccia dietro il torso.
Il video è stato
caricato su YouTube il 24 dicembre dal fotografo YoSee Gamzoo Letova, che al Corriere
ha confermato di essere l’autore. «Al momento sono in una zona di guerra nel pieno di una battaglia», dice tramite WhatsApp. Il 19 dicembre scriveva sul suo profilo Facebook di essere andato embedded
con i «guerrieri eroici» della brigata Nachal.
In un video pubblicato il 21 dicembre si intravede già lo stadio dove, secondo la ong Euro-Mediterranean Human Rights Monitor, l’Idf avrebbe arrestato centinaia di civili, «inclusi bambini fino a 10 anni e ultrasettantenni».
L’esercito israeliano, interpellato da Sky News , non ha negato l’autenticità del filmato. La replica: a essere fermati sono i sospettati di terrorismo, dopo gli interrogatori comincerebbero i rilasci. «Sono trattati in accordo alla legge internazionale», che nel caso dei bambini prevede (nella Convenzione di Ginevra e nei proto-colli aggiuntivi del 1977) però tutele speciali.
«È spesso necessario che i sospettati consegnino i vestiti perché le perquisizioni escludano la presenza di cinture esplosive o altre armi», aggiunge l’Idf. Gli abiti «non sono restituiti subito ai prigionieri», prima vengono ispezionati. In uno scorcio del video si vedono alcuni vestiti appesi sugli spalti o adagiati in cima alle recinzioni.
Il 7 dicembre avevano iniziato a circolare online
 altre immagini che mostravano alcuni uomini catturati dalle truppe israeliane nel nord della Striscia: bendati, genuflessi, anche loro spogliati dei vestiti e circondati dai soldati dell’Idf. La prima versione, avvalorata dai media israeliani, è che si trattasse di miliziani di Hamas che si erano arresi. La Cnn, dopo le verifiche, aveva sostenuto di poter escludere che fossero tutti miliziani: alcuni di loro sarebbero stati invece civili, non affiliati a a gruppi jihadisti.
Corriere della Sera è anche su Whatsapp. È sufficiente
cliccare qui per iscriversi al canale ed essere sempre aggiornati.
28 dicembre 2023 (modifica il 28 dicembre 2023 | 21:53)
© RIPRODUZIONE RISERVATA

author: RecentlyHeard
title: When And Where To See The Bright Comet Tonight
text:
When And Where To See The Bright Comet Tonight October 12, 2024 by RecentlyHeard A person stands exterior his tent pointing a flashlight immediately on the comet Tsuchinshan-ATLAS (C/2023 … [+] A3).
getty
What time will Comet Tsuchinshan-ATLAS be seen tonight? For the primary time since 202o’s Comet NEOWISE, there’s an simply seen comet within the sky. Comet Tsuchinshan-ATLAS, additionally referred to as C/2023 A3 and Comet A3, has exited the solar’s glare and is at the moment rising into the night time sky instantly after sundown.
Tonight, Saturday, Oct. 12, is the perfect time to search for it from the northern hemisphere. It reached its perihelion — the closest it will get to the solar — on Sept. 27 and is at present at its closest to Earth, passing about 44 million miles (71 million kilometers) distant.
Not that it will likely be a very straightforward sight, a minimum of for now. For now, it is very near the horizon, however with a great view of the western horizon and endurance, it may be seen proper after sundown. Over the following few nights, it will likely be at its brightest but additionally journey barely farther into the night time sky, that means it will likely be set towards a darker sky and stay within the sky for longer.
Here is precisely when and the place it’s good to look to see the comet along with your bare eyes on Saturday, Oct. 12.
Precisely the place to see comet Tsuchinshan-ATLAS, additionally referred to as C/2023 A3 and Comet A3, after sundown on … [+] Saturday, Oct. 12, 2024.
Stellarium The place To See Comet Tsuchinshan-ATLAS: Saturday, Oct. 12:
Place: west, 16.4 levels from the solar in Virgo
Time: 45 minutes after sundown the place you’re
Magnitude: +0.3
Comet’s distance from the solar: 52 million miles (84 million kilometers)
Comet’s distance from Earth: 44 million miles (71 million kilometers)
This night, the comet will likely be seen near the western horizon about 45 minutes after sundown. The waxing gibbous moon will likely be vivid, 73%-lit, however that will not make any distinction. The problem tonight will likely be to search out the comet within the vivid twilight near the horizon. When you have a totally clear horizon, discover the intense planet Venus and the intense star Arcturus; the comet will likely be just under a degree roughly midway between them.
This weekend is arguably the most effective occasions to see it. In comparison with Friday, Tsuchinshan-ATLAS will likely be somewhat greater and simpler to search out, and it’ll stay in view till somewhat later in twilight, in response to Sky & Telescope . Nonetheless, the observing window will likely be quick.
Though it’s best to be capable to see the comet along with your bare eyes, a pair of binoculars offers you an incredible view.
When and the place to see the intense Comet Tsuchinshan-ATLAS between Oct. 11 by Oct. 21 because it rises … [+] greater into the sky and turns into extra seen towards darker skies.
Sky & Telescope illustration (used with permission) The Finest Time To See Comet Tsuchinshan-ATLAS
Comet Tsuchinshan-ATLAS ought to be seen for round 10 nights. Monday, Oct. 14, and Tuesday, Oct. 15, are possible the technical finest evenings to see the comet, nevertheless it’s clever to start out wanting every night time till then as a result of cloud cowl will spoil your possibilities.
“The comet will seem greater within the sky and grow to be simpler to identify by the weekend,” states S ky & Telescope , in a press launch. “By early subsequent week, it will likely be at its finest for viewing.”
What Is Comet Tsuchinshan-ATLAS? It is a long-period comet from the Oort Cloud, which is a sphere round our photo voltaic system that is house to thousands and thousands of comets. It loops across the solar solely as soon as each 80,000 years.
Comet Tsuchinshan-ATLAS was found in January 2023 by astronomers at China’s Tsuchinshan (Purple Mountain) Observatory and South Africa’s Asteroid Terrestrial-impact Final Alert System (ATLAS) telescope.
Wishing you clear skies and extensive eyes.

author: VNExplorer
title: Cheflera: la planta que debes agregar a la decoración de tu casa sí o sí
text: Si buscas una planta hermosa y de fácil cuidado, la cheflera es para ti. Ideal para complementar la decoración de tu casa, dándole brillo y energía con sus colores verde y amarillo intensos. Al incorporar esta planta en tu hogar, no solo disfrutarás de su atractivo, también de sus propiedades purificadoras y su simbolismo positivo. Así que si necesitas una especie que combine estética y funcionalidad, esta es una excelente elección. La cheflera, también conocida como árbol paraguas enano, ha ganado popularidad en todo el mundo por la sencillez en sus cuidados y su inigualable belleza, y una vez que la conozcas querrás tenelas en tu jardín, gracias a su versatilidad y su poder de adaptarse a cualquier lugar. La cheflera es originaria de Taiwán y de la isla de Hainan en China. ¿Cuáles son las características de la cheflera? La cheflera tiene el nombre científico de Schefflera Arboricola y es una planta perenne que logra crecer tanto en interiores como en exteriores, dependiendo del clima. Tiene hojas compuestas de color verde brillante, que se disponen en forma de abanico, similar a un paraguas, de ahí su nombre común. Las hojitas pueden variar en tamaño, pero generalmente miden entre 10 y 20 centímetros de largo. Existen variedades con hojas variegadas, que poseen manchas de color amarillo o crema, añadiendo un toque decorativo. La cheflera es una planta ornamental originaria de Taiwán y de la isla de Hainan en China, esta planta pertenece a la familia Araliaceae y se destaca por su capacidad de adaptarse a diversas condiciones ambientales. Esta planta puede alcanzar alturas de hasta 2 metros en interiores y más de 4 metros en exteriores en su hábitat natural. Produce pequeñas flores blancas o amarillas, aunque es raro que florezca en interiores. Además, la Schefflera Arboricola tiene un crecimiento rápido, aunque puede ser podada para que mantengas la forma y el tamaño deseados. En la antigua China, la cheflera era utilizada para aliviar diversas dolencias. Historia y origen de la cheflera La cheflera fue descubierta en el siglo XIX y su nombre científico rinde homenaje a Jacob Christian Scheffler, un botánico alemán. Aunque es nativa de Taiwán y Hainan, ha sido introducida en muchas regiones del mundo debido a su atractivo como planta ornamental. En la medicina tradicional china, se utilizaba para tratar diversas dolencias, aunque hoy en día su uso es predominantemente decorativo. A lo largo de los años, la Schefflera Arboricola ha sido cultivada en diversas partes del mundo, adaptándose bien a climas tropicales y subtropicales. Su capacidad para prosperar en condiciones de luz indirecta y su resistencia a enfermedades comunes la han convertido en una favorita entre los amantes de las plantas, la razón por la que se ha hecho muy popular en la decoración de interiores. View the Instagram photo. ¿Cómo se cuida una cheflera? Otra de las razones por las que la cheflera es tan popular, es su bajo mantenimiento, pues es una plantita que no requiere de mucha atención. Eso no quiere decir que puedas descuidarla tanto tiempo, ya que, como todas las plantas, necesita cariño y algunos cuidados específicos para que prospere. Luz: esta plantita prefiere la luz indirecta brillante, aunque puede tolerar condiciones de luz media. Evita la luz solar directa, ya que sus hojas podrán quemarse. Riego: riega tu cheflera cuando la capa superior del suelo esté seca. Es importante que no te excedas con el riego para evitar el encharcamiento y la pudrición de las raíces. En invierno, reduce la frecuencia de agua. Temperatura y humedad: la Schefflera Arboricola prospera en temperaturas entre 15 y 24 grados centígrados. Prefiere ambientes húmedos, pero puede adaptarse a la humedad media del hogar. Si el ambiente es muy seco, considera rociar sus hojas con agua ocasionalmente. Suelo: utiliza un sustrato bien drenado y aireado. Un sustrato para plantas de interior con perlita o arena es ideal. Fertilización: aplica un fertilizante balanceado una vez al mes durante la primavera y el verano para promover un crecimiento saludable. Poda: la poda regular ayuda a mantener la forma y el tamaño que tú desees. Retira las hojas muertas o amarillentas para estimular un nuevo crecimiento. La cheflera tiene la capacidad de purificar el aire del espacio en el que se encuentre. Significado y beneficios de que tengas una cheflera en casa Tener una cheflera en casa no solo embellece el espacio, también aporta varios beneficios. En muchas culturas, se cree que esta planta trae buena suerte y prosperidad. Su presencia tiene el poder de mejorar el estado de ánimo y reducir el estrés, creando un ambiente más armonioso. Además, esta planta actúa como un purificador natural del aire. Según estudios de la NASA, las plantas de interior como la Schefflera pueden eliminar toxinas como el formaldehído, el benceno y el tricloroetileno del aire, mejorando la calidad del aire interior. Esto es especialmente beneficioso en entornos urbanos donde la contaminación es un problema común. La cheflera es ideal para todo jardín, no importa si inicias en el mundo de las plantas o si ya eres un experto, esta pequeña te conquistará el corazón en cuanto la veas. Sigue leyendo más historias interesantes:
